title: Hour 1: Knicks and Match
description:
Chris Russo, Brian Windhorst, and Freddie Coleman discuss if the Nets or the Lakers have more questions regarding their team. The guys debate what the 76ers' ceiling with their current team is, if they would rather have Russell Westbrook or James Harden for next season, and whether the Knicks clearing $19 million in cap space to try and sign Jalen Brunson is a good move. Courtney Cronin joins the show to discuss if the Browns should want Baker Mayfield back and if the team should trade for Jimmy Garoppolo.

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Knicks clear $19 million in cap space through trade with Pistons.
